entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
